scripts.push: npm run gcloud:cluster:auth && docker push $(./dev/env DOCKER_TAG)
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run push && npm run gcloud:deployment:update
scripts.gcloud:cluster:create: gcloud container clusters create fav --zone us-central1-c
scripts.gcloud:pool:delete-default: gcloud container node-pools delete default-pool --cluster fav
scripts.gcloud:pool:create: gcloud container node-pools create fav-pool --zone us-central1-c --cluster fav --num-nodes 1 --machine-type n1-standard-4 --disk-type pd-ssd --disk-size 128GB --accelerator type=nvidia-tesla-k80,count=1
